Class Meteor

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.model.Hit
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.model.Meteor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Meteor extends Hit
Represents a meteor-type hit that can strike the spaceship. A Meteor is a specific instance of Hit, with a given type and direction.

This class is used to model meteors impacting the game board, and it can be displayed through an AdventureTemplate in the command-line interface.

  • Constructor Details

    • Meteor

      public Meteor(Hit.Type type, Hit.Direction direction)
      Constructs a new Meteor with the specified type and direction.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the meteor (BIG or SMALL)
      direction - the direction from which the meteor approaches (TOP, RIGHT, BOTTOM, LEFT)

  • Method Details

    • print

      public void print(AdventureTemplate adventureTemplate)
      Displays the meteor using the provided AdventureTemplate. This method calls setHitType on the template, passing itself as the argument.
      Specified by:
      print in class Hit
      Parameters:
      adventureTemplate - the CLI template used to render the meteor
